column5: how have the current weather conditions been on Gull Rock? Hope that when we get up there in 2 weeks a cold front doesn't roll in while we are up there and shut the fishing down.

We always hope for a hard frost before we get up there (2 weeks also). Not only kills off the mosquitoes, but also helps get that water temp moving downward. I think it turns the fish on. They put their feedbags on. Seems last few years the weathers been too nice, and can't seem to catch as many of the over 23's. Pat T

Will be up in a week. Already got a big game plan setup for this trip. Learned alot new spots in July got some new baits/tactics I wanna try out.Not really worried about weather I am sure it will be 20x better then the 100 degree stuff in Iowa!!!!Go big or Go home!!!! Is what I am thinking on baits!

Last Saturday and Sunday the weather was very hot with no wind, the bite was off with fish biting very light, small minnows worked the best all week. weather and water unseasonably mild, lake water down 3 feet for lack of summer rain. Mid week weather cooled and clouds rolled in and the bite was on again but still a light bite. Huge clouds of bait fish graphed all over the typical fishing spots. Heavy wind scattered bait pods and fish behind reefs. Hard to trigger bites. Smaller fish active in 14 to 15 feet on jigs and lindy rigs. Bigger fish are deep and harder to locate, not in the typical spots. Lots of healthy Northern sharking around mid lake structure.Hard to find 18's many fish 16 and under and lots of 21 to 22's.Bring lots of cold weather clothes.
awesome i like to hear bring warm gear that makes me happy thanks for the info

How has the weather been it looks like it is going to be nice up there this next week any new report on the fish and any size of wallys and pike being caught i'll be there eith the inlaws in 2 weeks and i can't wait. Also we've never been up here this late in the season anything special that works better in mid september any info would be great. Thanks fish bookie

WHICH will not hurt my feelings going up later in year and freezing your butt off sounds kinda fun right now vs 100 degree heat!
